text: Under new mgt as of May 2015. Still reasonably-priced. Unassuming decor but better TVs, better seating/tables, evolving menu.
A nice relaxed step-up-from-a-dive-bar. The drinks were neither expensive or watered-down. Friendly crowd and nice bartenders. The bathroom was clean too. Hope they have karaoke again soon!
I love em Saggy.  Great dive bar but still not enough reason to go to the Eastside..
